description: Synthetic or semi-synthetic polymers used for thickening, film-forming, conditioning, or texture building.

items.name: Hyaluronic Acid (LMW Powder)
items.hydration_instructions: Hydrate in deionized water at 0.1-1% with vigorous mixing; allow to swell fully.

items.name: Carbomer 940
items.hydration_instructions: Disperse 0.1-1% into water, allow to wet fully, then neutralize to desired pH.

items.name: Polyquaternium-7
items.hydration_instructions: Use as-supplied solution; add during cool-down phase below 40°C.
